transcript: I study books I don't read them I don't know what I want to get from a book that I don't read to begin with the moment I open a book I open a blank document I actually take the notes as they come and I'll reorganize them into action items I just get all the stuff and then reprocessing the notes is usually the most valuable thing that I can do from the book you take all the notes and then you re-categorize them into like the buckets that they all apply to then from the buckets that you have then you can create action items from there that are relevant to you read organize prioritize
